entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
